Definition in file TMPS001.h.

#include <DAVE3.h>
enum  TMPS001_SensorStateType
typedef enum
TMPS001_SensorStateType 		TMPS001_SensorStateType
#define TMPS001_Enable()   ((SCU_GENERAL->DTSCON) &= ~(1U))
#define TMPS001_Disable()   (SCU_GENERAL->DTSCON |= 0x01)
status_t TMPS001_GetStatus (void)
 This function gets the status of the die temperature sensor.
uint32_t TMPS001_ReadTemp (void)
 This function calculates the temperature and returns the value in celsius. Note that the temperature returns only a integer value, as the resolution of DTS sensor is +/- 6 degree celsius.
status_t TMPS001_StartMeasurement (void)
 The Die Temperature Sensor (DTS) generates a measurement by calling TMPS001_StartMeasurement() result that indicates directly the current temperature.The result of the measurement can be obtained by calling TMPS001_ReadTemp().
